basics.name: Karel Frederix
basics.label: Software engineer
basics.summary:
I’m a full stack software developer with a passion for modern web technology. I can build applications from the ground up, from backend architecture to frontend implementation. I enjoy fiddling with new tools/frameworks/servers, acquiring new skills along the way.

When I am not working, I’m spending time with my 2 beautiful children, or playing amateur football.

work.summary: Architecture and development on  the company's main software products: SoccerLAB, TennisLife and Panega. These  sports tech solutions are centralized information and management systems, designed to support the complete technical staff, management and players of sports organizations. They combine data and video in one solution.
highlights: Implement automated deployment system using Jenkins
Set up and maintain build pipelines using Jenkins and Azure DevOps
Set up Node.js (micro-)service for report rendering with Express framework and jsreport-core
Implement API gateway for mobile apps using LoopBack with MongoDB
Lead a small team of devs  working on a suite of mobile apps, using Ionic / Angular
Implement advanced authentication system using Auth0

work.summary:
Worked on numerous challenging software projects, most of which involved communicating directly with clients in order to develop custom software solutions. Most of these projects are focused on user interfaces for tv-size (32” - 55”) multi-touch screens.
Applications range from cms-powered interactive multimedia presentations to educational games for children.
Worked on several research projects at EDM, which is the ICT research institute of Hasselt University.
highlights:
EFRO - GameHUB project:
Was responsible for the implementation of the UNIZO game: an educational game focussed on entrepreneurship. The implementation was done with the delightful Unity game development tool.

IBBT - PISA project:
Worked on a prototype multi-touch 3D previsualization tool, intended for drama production.

work.summary: Worked on several custom web applications for clients, front end and back end.

education.description: Wrote master's thesis on "Free Viewpoint Video". This thesis explored some algorithms that allow the viewer of a video dataset to freely and interactively change their viewpoint, despite the footage being recorded by only a small number of static cameras.
Courses on entrepreneurship, mathematics and legal issues

publications.name: Exploring Whole-Hand Gestures in a Tabletop Environment for Urban Modeling
A Spatial Immersive Office Environment for Computer-supported Collaborative Work - Moving towards the Office of the Future
A Framework for Networked Interactive Surfaces
publications.publisher: 2nd Workshop on Software Engineering and Architecture for Realtime Interactive Systems, SEARIS @ VR

publications.name: A Multi-Touch 3D Set Modeler for Drama Production
publications.publisher: International Broadcasting Convention, 2008, Amsterdam, The Netherlands
